name: Haunted Gnome

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Cha 13, gnome magic racial trait, Knowledge (arcana) 1 rank.

sections.text: You add haunted fey aspect (page 230) to your list of gnome magic spell-like abilities, and you can use this spell-like ability twice per day.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You use your gnome magic to take on an eerie illusory appearance.
